Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED
Name: Vase
Description: Cylindrical vase with straight rim and walls, a barely marked curvature at the bottom and a convex base. Fine paste of a pink colour. The exterior surface bears a painted decoration of undulating branches with alternating lanceolate leaves, the outline of which is dark red in colour and the inside of which is painted in orangey-red. The design appears in the central part of the vase, between horizontal lines which encircle the piece at the rim and the base.
